data.title: Brookfield Properties
data.meta_description: Brookfield Properties | 295,996 followers on LinkedIn. Our success starts with our people. People like you. | Brookfield Properties develops and operates real estate investments on behalf of Brookfield Asset Management ‚Äî one of the largest alternative asset managers in the world. From office to retail, logistics to multifamily, and hospitality to development, we work across sectors to bring high-quality, sustainable real estate to life around the globe every day.
data.text:
We are deeply committed to inspiring growth and fostering the development of the next generation of professionals. Our Summer 2024 interns have truly exemplified this dedication, infusing passion, innovation, and enthusiasm into our teams across retail, arts & events, logistics, and multifamily. Their experiences and insights have been invaluable, and we are excited to share their advice for future interns. Swipe through to read their words of wisdom and join us in celebrating their journey. If you‚Äôre ready to take the next step in your career and explore opportunities with us, visit our careers page to learn more.: https://lnkd.in/gU3xqaWJ #InternLife #CareerAdvice #Summer2024 #BrookfieldProperties #SummerInterns #InternshipExperience #FutureLeaders #RealEstate #Retail #Office #Arts #Logistics #Multifamily #RealEstate

We believe in prioritizing self-care and promoting healthy routines. That's why our properties are equipped with fantastic wellness amenities such as indoor swimming pools, weekly yoga classes, meditation rooms, and more. Recently, tenants at Aldgate Tower in London enjoyed a refreshing morning pilates class, courtesy of Activated by #BrookfieldProperties. This community engagement program brings office tenants together through live experiences, workshops, well-being activities, arts, and events. üßò‚ôÇÔ∏è‚ú® Last month, the Faria Lima Square and Faria Lima Financial Center in Brazil offered free morning yoga classes for our tenants, offering a moment of meditation to help build health and well-being. Join us in celebrating #NationalWellnessMonth and making time for self-care! How are you prioritizing your well-being this month? #ActivatedBrookfieldProperties #AxiisApp #CorporateWorkshop #CorporateProgramming #AldgateTower #London #Office

Collaboration is at the core of our success. By fostering strong team bonds, encouraging creative problem-solving, and promoting continuous learning, we empower our employees to work together effectively and become the best versions of themselves every day. Our Brookfield Properties team in India attended their 2024 annual offsite, where they engaged in insightful knowledge-sharing sessions, fun team-building exercises, and games that fueled synergy and team spirit among all, they seized each moment and truly embodied the ‚ÄòOne Team‚Äô spirit. Congratulations on the successful offsite!üí™‚ú®

At Passeio Paulista in S√£o Paulo, Brazil, the 14th Buildings Exclusive event brought together more than 350 real estate leaders to discuss the office and logistics market. Fernando Didziakas, Managing Partner at Buildings, delivered an insightful presentation on office and logistics market trends, emphasizing the high demand for logistics parks and a positive outlook for S√£o Paulo. Afterward, Hilton Rejman, Executive President of Brookfield Properties, invited guests to explore Passeio Paulista, a multi-use development that seamlessly integrates offices, retail, and residential, showcasing our commitment to innovative urban spaces. #Brazil #BrookfieldPropertiesinBrazil #Development #RealEstate #PasseioPaulista #SaoPaulo

Our pledge to sustainability is at the core of everything we do. We‚Äôre on a mission to create amazing places that are good for the environment, society, and our stakeholders. Our achievements in Australia showcase this dedication. Our properties across Australia are setting new standards in environmentally sustainable practices. Since 2019, Brookfield Properties Australia has achieved a 27% reduction in carbon emissions, a 12% decrease in water use, and a 40% decrease in energy use. With a 6-star Green Star Rating at One the Esplanade in Perth and a 4-star portfolio-wide certification, we‚Äôre leading the way in sustainable real estate, making a real difference on a global scale. Join us in celebrating these milestones and our journey towards a sustainable future! Want to know more? Read our 2023 Australia Sustainability Report: https://lnkd.in/gxz-xWNt #Sustainability #GreenBuilding #BrookfieldProperties #EcoFriendly #FutureForward #ImpactAtScale #BrookfieldPropertiesinAustralia #PerthAustralia #Office

Revitalizing the past to inspire the future, the restoration of Lever House stands as a testament to what can be achieved through passion, collaboration, and dedication. We are proud to celebrate the collaborative efforts that have led to the restoration of the historic Lever House, honored with the prestigious Lucy G. Moses Preservation Award by The New York Landmarks Conservancy. This achievement underscores the significance of the project and the dedication of everyone involved. Congratulations to all the architects, designers, consultants, and individuals who worked tirelessly to preserve this architectural treasure, bringing it back to its 1957 glory. Skidmore, Owings & Merrill (SOM), Pavarini McGovern Videography: FRAME Studios #LeverHouse #BrookfieldProperties #NewYork #Office #RealEstate

Summer is heating up across Brookfield Place across the globe! From the smooth jazz vibes at Brookfield Place Toronto to the eco-conscious Rooted market at ICD Brookfield Place, we're bringing the community together all season long with events, art installations, and more. ‚òÄÔ∏è Morning Melodies series at Brookfield Place Toronto ‚òÄÔ∏èRooted, an eco-conscious market, in the Summer Garden at #ICDBrookfieldPlace ‚òÄÔ∏è Portside, outdoor dining at Brookfield Place New York #BrookfieldProperties #BrookfieldPlace #SummerEvents #CommunityEngagement #Dubai #Toronto #Retail #NewYork #ArtsandEvents

We‚Äôre thrilled to highlight two remarkable achievements from Brookfield Properties Brasil! Our partner, GRUPO MONTO, has been honored with the prestigious InovaINFRA Award from Revista O Empreiteiro. Their innovative approach at the Logistics Park in Extrema, Brazil implemented engineered eucalyptus, a 100% renewable material, in two buildings‚Äîan important step towards our global goal of achieving net zero by 2050. Additionally, we are proud to announce that Brookfield Properties and Brookfield Asset Management in Brazil have been recognized for the second consecutive year as an Intern Friendly Company by WallJobs. This accolade reflects our dedication to fostering young talent through meaningful internship programs within a supportive work environment. #BrookfieldProperties #BrookfieldPropertiesinBrasil #Sustainability #Internship #Innovation #Brasil

At Brookfield Properties, we‚Äôre not just building the next generation of cities but also of industry leaders. This summer, we welcomed talented interns across our retail, office, logistics, multifamily, and development teams. From hands-on experience to professional skill development, we‚Äôre proud of their growth and contributions and can't wait to see where their careers take them. Swipe through to read their favorite part about working here! Want to join our team?
